response.job_title: Data Science | BI | Machine Learning | Analytics | Revenue Management | Industrial Engineering
response.summary: Master in Data Science and Big Data with experience in making data-based decisions to generate value in technology, tourism, energy and aviation companies. Development of tools and solutions that include the extraction, processing, analysis and visualization of data. Leadership of projects that involve the search and implementation of innovative solutions and continuous improvement of processes. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, SQL, and Spark. Bilingual (Spanish, English)
response.skills: Economic Analysis, Reporting, Process Automation, VBA Programming, Pricing Strategy, Revenue Management, Statistical Data Analysis, PostgreSQL, Reporting & Analysis, Data Engineering, Hive, Google Data Studio, Consultancy Services, Snowflake, Data Modeling, Project Management, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Azure, Azure Databricks, Cloud Computing

profile_positions.description:
• Define, design, and implement technological data analytics solutions in 2 companies of aviation and technology sectors.
• Lead teams of 2-4 consultants in the execution of consulting services, including resource planning, organization and prioritization of tasks, and training and technical mentoring.
• Manage the relationship with clients, ensuring the efficient execution of projects, satisfaction with deliverables and the creation of lasting consulting partnerships.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and implemented the data governance model for Latin America to improve user experience KPIs and identify improvement opportunities in the BPOs.
• Built the data flow to track indicators for each country, business line and BPO in the region through dashboards and balanced scorecards.
profile_positions.title: BI Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Implemented machine learning models for user segmentation of the different categories to optimize communication flow, increase conversion and revenue of the company.
• Designed the data flow required for decision-making in the area, from extraction through ETLs to visualization in dashboards.
• Developed tools to support the optimization of the processes in the area.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Defined and implemented pricing strategies in the different distribution channels for hotels and resorts in Latin America and the Caribbean in order to optimize the company's revenues.
• Led specific projects through the execution of work plans that guarantee their optimal and timely development.
• Developed statistical and optimization analyzes for decision making.
• Created and updated tools that support the efficient development of area processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Revenue Management Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Reconciled of the public lighting tax for Cundinamarca, guaranteeing the quality and timeliness of the information.
• Supported the implementation of new business models on digital platforms and their integration with the company's information systems.
• Automated the different processes of the department in order to optimize resources and improve productivity.
• Designed and updated dashboards that allow monitoring of department indicators and contribute to decision making.
profile_positions.title: Digital Transformation Professional

profile_positions.description:
• Defined and implemented the overbooking levels on routes in Colombia and Europe, minimizing the impact on the service level and seat spoilage.
• Led specific projects through the execution of work plans that guarantee their optimal and timely development.  
• Forecasted routes' revenue in Colombia and Europe based on macroeconomic analysis and market behavior through time series analysis.
• Analyzed and evaluated the economic impact of fleet allocation scenarios and itinerary adjustments in order to maximize network's revenue and profit.
• Led and proposed short-term capacity actions, validating their timely and correct implementation.
• Developed statistical and optimization analyses for decision making.
• Created and updated tools that support the efficient development of the processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Revenue Management Analyst

education.degree_name: Master’s in Data Science and Big Data

company.name: SDG Group
company.description:
SDG Group is a global consulting firm specialized in Data & Analytics. We are committed in unlocking the organizations’ potential and hidden value by offering in-depth analytics expertise that empowers our client´s business model to become successful data-driven enterprises. Innovation is in our DNA.  We constantly innovate our value proposition with cutting-edge laboratories and transformational models to provide the ultimate analytics practices and solutions.

SDG Group works on the pillars of a Triple Expertise, incorporating business process skills by domain, with a technological knowledge and a partnership with the most important and innovative software providers. We also add to our portfolio cutting-edge laboratories and the development of advanced analytics & AI technologies.
